texts.name: Don Singhel
texts.biography: Although he has unusual skills for a zombie (and above all, he can think and plan!). In Dejia he was considered only one of the soldiers. Don Singhel joined Kastore as quickly as he could.

specialty.description:
{Cyber Deads and Cyber Zombies}

Increases Speed of any Cyber Deads or Cyber Zombies by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every level (rounded up)
specialty.name: Cyber Deads
